channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Dog sled, ski ballet and other sports you could once see at the Winter Olympics
item.description: For many decades, Olympic Games included "demonstration sports." Some, like curling, became part of the permanent roster. But others, like skijoring, ...

item.title: What does the CIA not want you to know? The quiz has the secret
item.description: Plus: ambiguous mascots, rodents with hard-to-spell names, and three boring photos of buildings.

item.title: America’s Game
item.description: We tell you everything you need to know about this year’s Super Bowl.

item.title: U.S. and Iran Set for Talks in Oman
item.description: Middle Eastern diplomats see a chance for progress on Iran’s nuclear program, but they are pessimistic about other U.S. demands.

item.title: Minneapolis now has daily deportation flights. One man has been documenting them

item.title: Europe Accuses TikTok of ‘Addictive Design’ and Pushes for Change
item.description: European Union regulators said the app’s infinite scroll and personalized algorithm led to “compulsive” behavior, especially among children.

item.title: Iran Is at Work on Missile and Nuclear Sites, Satellite Images Show

item.title: What to Expect at the Olympic Opening Ceremonies, From the Man Behind Them
item.description: Marco Balich has helped design grand spectacles at more than half a dozen Olympics. On Friday, he’ll do it again, on home turf in Italy.

item.description: The attack bore the hallmark of several assassination attempts on top military officers in the Russian capital.
